original_title: Goods: From a Three-Screen Slide Show Made for a Lecture on "The New Covetables" Given by Charles Eames
overview: An excerpt from the Charles Eliot Norton Lectures, which Charles delivered at Harvard University in 1970-71. Includes an evocative discussion of what Charles called “The New Covetables” (knowledge not things), illustrated with a rich array of photographs.
title: Goods: From a Three-Screen Slide Show Made for a Lecture on "The New Covetables" Given by Charles Eames
